amendment.description: To require the Secretary of the Army to submit to Congress a plan to finish remediation activities conducted by the Secretary in Umatilla, Oregon.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2341 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2341 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4195) To require the Secretary of the Army to submit to Congress a plan to finish remediation activities conducted by the Secretary in Umatilla, Oregon.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2341 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2341 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2301.
